hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Prelude of Light#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals an #Octorok# guarding a rich pool.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Milk Bottle# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Bug Bottle#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Keaton Mask#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: Without the Lens of Truth, the Treasure Chest Mini-Game is a 1 out of 32 chance.^Good luck!

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Keaton Mask#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #Goron City#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: I once glued a set of false teeth to the Boomerang.^${12 39 c7}That came back to bite me.

LH (Lab).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Top

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Remember that time you did that really embarrassing thing?^${12 68 3A}Yikes.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #1# major item.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bow#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Lullaby Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Mask of Truth#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Hover Boots#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Second Right Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Giant's Knife# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.
